thread.title: One of the best cost benefit hotels in NYC
thread.title_full: One of the best cost benefit hotels in NYC - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Manhattan-Midtown East, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Paulo Q
title: One of the best cost benefit hotels in NYC
text:
Not the first time I stayed there and certainly not the last. Excellent location, great facilities and friendly staff.
On high floors elevators could take some time to get people specially on high floors
